name: Call for papers: 17th South-Eastern European Economic Research Workshop, 4-5 December 2023, Tirana, Albania
content: The Bank of Albania has the pleasure to announce the organisation of the17th South-Eastern European Economic Research Workshop (SEE-ERW), which will be held on 4 and 5 December 2023, in Tirana, Albania. The SEE-ERW 2023 will be a hybrid event (both in-person and virtual). The workshop is intended to provide a forum for discussing innovative research, and boosting the exchange of views among researchers from the Bank of Albania, other central bankers in the region and beyond, as well from international and national financial and academic institutions, on issues related to the central bank. Authors are welcome to submit extended abstracts or, preferably, full drafts of papers as well as a short bio, by 2 October 2023 to: BoAresearchworkshop@bankofalbania.org. Authors of the accepted papers will be notified by 16 October 2023 You will find more detailed information about the workshop in the document: “Invitation and Call for Papers -17th South-Eastern European Economic Research Workshop“.
